short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically mutes the advertisements played while streaming Hotstar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Problems :
1)A simple pleasure of watching IPL while doing coursework is ruined by the irritatingly loud advertisements  asking me to buy items I don't need. 
2)I am engaged in a moving piece of cinema and a bag of wash detergent is rubbed onto my face with a chirpy music that immediately pulls me out of the movie world.
 
I want peace from this unnecessary noise. This simple extension solves the problem, it automatically mutes the tab as soon as an advertisement starts playing on your streaming window and unmutes it when the advertisement disappears.  Cheers to noiseless advertisements!
